alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 19 at 4:58PM PDT until April 19 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT /9 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. A few gusts around 60 mph possible near Red Rock Canyon. * WHERE...Most of Clark and southern Nye counties in southern Nevada, as well as the Lake Mead National Recreation Area. This includes the Las Vegas metro area. * WHEN...Until 9 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Dangerous boating conditions expected on Lake Mead and Lake Mohave due to high wave activity. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas on the west side of the Las Vegas Valley like Summerlin and Mountains Edge will likely see higher wind gusts compared to the rest of the Valley.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
